archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Cancel Customer Bill Inquiry
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Request cancellation of existing customer bill inquiry reports Extended Description Not used for this process element. Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory The purpose of Cancel Customer Bill Inquiry process is to cancel existing customer bill inquiries. Optional The cancellation may be caused by the cancellation requests of bill inquiry from the specific customers, a CSR or processes.
